subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
Pt

LINDSAY'S MOM UNPLUGGED!
Is
Lindsay Lohan out of control or just misunderstood? Tonight,
the outrageous things Lindsay's mom is saying about her
daughter's	partying -- and speaking out about pictures
that
allegedly show Lindsay doing a very bad thing!Showbiz
Tonight
reveals how Lindsay's mom  is trying to  stick up
for her
daughter but instead may be suffering from a bad
case of 
foot-in-mouth disease!

PREGNANT STARS
LOSING WEIGHT RIDICULOUSLY FAST!
How in the world do
stars like Heidi Klum and Katie Holmes go
from the delivery
room to the red carpet so quickly?How do they
lose the baby
weight so fast? Is it safe? And are they setting
a bad
example?Tonight, Showbiz Tonight with the incredible
stories of superstars losing baby weight -- super-fast!

WOMEN BEHIND BARS!
As Paris Hilton gets set
to serve a 45-day jail sentence for
violating probation,
what lessons can she learn from other big
celebrities of
privilege who also got tossed in the pokey, from
Martha
Stewart to Lil' Kim. Showbiz Tonight with the secrets of
stars surviving in the lock-up!

WHY DO WE LOVE
TO HATE PARIS HILTON?
Showbiz Tonight has been
overwhelmed by emails from viewers
saying how much they
despise Paris Hilton and are glad she is
going to jail.
What is it about Paris that sets so many people
off? Why is
she so disliked?

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE
DAY
Paris Hilton "traumatized": Do you feel sorry for
her?


VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL
Send your response to the
Question Of The Day on video. Look
into your camera and
tell us what you think. Responses must be
no longer than 30
seconds. To send your video email, go to
cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses on
"Showbiz
Tonight" at 
11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline
Prime.
